EmailTemplate.description: Notifying Mentor on Mentee's Feedback Completion: Email Template
EmailTemplate.name: Notifying Mentor on KRA Completion
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: KRA Completion Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Goal__c.Check_In_By__c},
We are happy to inform you that you have successfully completed {!Goal__c.Resource__c} KRA review.
Thank you for your proactive participation in the mentorship program. Your dedication contributes significantly to our shared success.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
